com.abiquo.abicloud.model
Class VirtualApplianceModel

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.abiquo.abicloud.model.VirtualApplianceModel

public class VirtualApplianceModel
extends java.util.Observable

The Class VirtualApplianceModel represents a mini model to maintain a list of virtual appliances .
